channel.title: Proftpd on wd and cc
channel.description: Recent content in Proftpd on wd and cc

item.title: proftpd 配置
item.description:
www.proftpd.org
ServerName "Caph ftp server..."
ServerType standalone
DefaultServer on
Port 21
Umask 002
MaxInstances 30
User ftp
Group ftp
DisplayLogin .welcome.msg
DeferWelcome on
ServerIdent Off
UseReverseDNS off
IdentLookups off
MaxLoginAttempts 3
MaxClientsPerHost 2
MaxClients 20
MaxInstances 100
ListOptions ""
DirFakeUser On ftp
DirFakeGroup On ftp
DeferWelcome On
LogFormat awstats "%t %h %u %m %f %s %b"
ExtendedLog /var/log/xferlog read,write awstats
TransferLog none
SystemLog /var/log/proftpd.log
ServerIdent off
WtmpLog off
DefaultRoot ~ ftp
Order allow,deny
DenyGroup !ftp
AllowOverwrite on
AllowStoreRestart on
# AllowForeignAddress on

DenyUser ftp


AllowUser it




AllowUser ftp
